education_text.0: He is the son of Aizik Guberman (writer, poet) and his wife Etya (teacher)The common approach to computer handwriting recognition was computer learning on a set of examples (characters or words) presented as visual objectsThe common approach to computer handwriting recognition was computer learning on a set of examples (characters or words) presented as visual objectsThe common approach to computer handwriting recognition was computer learning on a set of examples (characters or words) presented as visual objects
